head.title: Swap pages in {{FileFormatUp}} documents using {{EnvName}} apps
head.description: Use {{ProdFullName}} to swap pages in {{FileFormatUp}} files. Easily manage PDFs, Word documents, spreadsheets, presentations, Visio diagrams, images, archives, and more.

header.title: Swap {{FileFormatUp}} pages
header.description: {{ProdFullName}} enhances {{EnvNameShort}} applications with advanced document processing. Swap pages in {{FileFormatUp}} files to better organize and control your content.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: {{ProdShortName}} features
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a document processing library that supports 50+ file formats, including PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Visio, images, and archives. Add it to your applications to merge, split, extract, rearrange, swap, and remove pages in widely used document formats.

more_features.title: Advanced document management
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} provides a powerful set of tools for processing over 50 file formats with ease.

feature_1.title: Merge various document types
feature_1.content: Combine PDFs, Word documents, spreadsheets, presentations, Visio diagrams, images, and archive files. Customize output with flexible options.

feature_2.title: Rearrange document pages
feature_2.content: Modify document layout by moving, swapping, or deleting pages for better content organization.

feature_3.title: Adjust page orientation
feature_3.content: Rotate pages to a specific angle or switch between portrait and landscape mode.

feature_4.title: Extract selected pages
feature_4.content: Select specific pages or page ranges and save them as a separate document.

formats.title: Swap pages in various file formats
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} supports over 50 file formats, allowing precise document modifications.

operations.title: Main features
operations.description: Discover the key features of our document processing library.

examples.comment_2: Specify the page numbers to swap

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) makes it easy to swap {{FileFormatUp}} pages, giving you full control over document content. Use it in your {{EnvName}} applications for seamless document processing.
content.step_1: Specify the path to the {{FileFormatUp}} file.
content.step_2: Select the page numbers to swap.
content.step_3: Use the appropriate method to swap pages.
content.step_4: Save the updated document to the desired location.

code_1.title: Swap the first and last pages of a {{FileFormatUp}} file
code_1.content: This example shows how to swap pages in a {{FileFormatUp}} file in just a few steps.
